title: Was Buddy Ebsen the Original ‘Wizard of Oz’ Tin Man?
subtitle: The person first slated to play the Tin Woodman in MGM's 1939 film version of 'The Wizard of Oz' was actually Ray Bolger.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Buddy Ebsen was slated to play the Tin Woodman in the 1939 film version of The Wizard of Oz, but he had to be replaced after the aluminum makeup used with his costume made him gravely ill.
